data.title: Church services across Sampson
data.meta_description: Sampson County Senior Health and Community Fair will be held today at 11 a.m till 3 p.m. at the Sampson Agri-Exposition Center on Warsaw Road, Clinton, N.C.
data.text:
Sampson County Senior Health and Community Fair will be held today at 11 a.m till 3 p.m. at the Sampson Agri-Exposition Center on Warsaw Road, Clinton, N.C. The first 400 attendees will get a boxed lunch, a grocery voucher, raffle drawings, Bingo games and several other activities. FMI, call 910-592-2933-or 910-592-4653.
